column5: Well, laughing at idiocy might not qualify me for the world's most positive attitude, but it beats the hell out of fuming about it.  http://literallyunbelievable.org
Thanks Bruce !!! That made me smile  Happy Spring !  paul
Yes..easiest winter in my memory having said that I had two nasty bouts with a PITA flu bug just recovering now from the second, definately doing the flu vaccine thing next year!!!  Happy Spring
